OANDA_DEMO_ACCOUNT_ID: Populate this file with your OANDA credentials to allow connections to the OANDA API.
OANDA_DEMO_API_KEY: The backtesting or real-time trading components will not run before you populate this file.
OANDA_LIVE_ACCOUNT_ID: As long as you do not wish to trade real money, you can simply use the 'live=False' flag and leave these values empty.
OANDA_LIVE_API_KEY: When you are ready, rename this file to 'credentials.json'. Do not check in your credentials to the repository.
